content.text: Hello! I am a ballet dancer and I don't really care about the weather as long as I can listen to VNV Nation. What about you?
Hello! I like to sing in the rain, it helps me relax and clear my head. I also like to work at my church's food pantry. What do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and I enjoy ice cream. I also enjoy dancing, but I don't get to do it as much as I would like.
That's nice. I spend most of my days working at my church's food pantry. I enjoy it because it's rewarding to help people.
That's great! It sounds like you're doing a lot of good things with your time.

I'm not sure if I'm good at keeping up with my family, but I try my best to stay in touch with them. I'm a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.
That's good! It's important to be happy with who you are.
